feed.subtitle: A simple, whitespace theme for academics. Based on [*folio](https://github.com/bogoli/-folio) design.

entry.title: New Job Position
entry.content: From the 1st of April I will be part of the project “Statistics for vegetation biodiversity: estimation and mapping (SVeBio)”. I am excited to join the Department of Economics and Statistics Cognetti de Martiis as a postdoctoral reseracher on the SVeBio project. This project aims to develop new statistical methods for estimating and mapping vegetation biodiversity.
entry.summary: Postdoctoral Researcher at Department of Economics and Statistics Cognetti de Martiis, University of Torino
